product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Lite Presta Tube -- 700 x 28-35
long_description: New lightweight self-sealing tube comes pre-gooped with SLIME tire sealant which repeatedly seals punctures up to 1/8 of an inch. The high-tech, environmentally-responsible formula inside the tube keeps working where the thorn resistant tube stops. SLIME is environmentally safe, non-aerosol, non-toxic and non-hazardous. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: New lightweight self-sealing tube comes pre-gooped with SLIME tire sealant which repeatedly seals punctures up to 1/8 of an inch.
